description: Try our easy to follow Pimms-Icles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pimms-Icles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide cucumber, strawberry and mint between 8 x 1/3-cup capacity popsicle moulds.

Place lemonade in a bowl and whisk to release gas â€“ you want it to be flat. Stir in Pimms and ginger. Pour evenly into moulds, cover with foil and insert a stick in the middle of each mould. Freeze for 6 hours or until frozen.
To serve, dip moulds briefly in hot water to loosen, remove foil and slide out popsicles.
